snippet.title: Iggy's Egg Adventure Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Iggy's Egg Adventure © Ginger Labs LLC 2012-2015. All rights reserved. http://www.IggysEggAdventure.com/
Music by Fat Bard  http://www.fatbardmusic.com/
Video by Ryan Winzen http://upheavalarts.com/

Iggy’s Egg Adventure is a prehistoric platformer 75 million years in the making. You play as Iggy, a baby Velociraptor who must rescue his mother from her evil caveman captors, while collecting as many of her eggs as you can along the way. Iggy’s Egg Adventure has a classic platform feel with stylized 3D graphics on a modern gaming engine.

Be sure to subscribe for more videos and follow us on Facebook ( http://www.facebook.com/iggyseggadventure/ )

Ginger Labs LLC permits anyone to make videos of Iggy's Egg Adventure and share them online. The videos may be monetized. You can also include the in game music alongside gameplay in these videos. We ask that together with any footage you include a working link to our website - www.IggysEggAdventure.com

Iggy’s Egg Adventure uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.
Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2015, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved
